leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 药物发现-虚拟筛选与对接生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 构象→对接→打分→再打分→验证→工作流
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 对接引擎 + HPC/workflow + 平台

unit.unit_name: 分子准备/构象生成/枚举

queries: [WEB] ligand preparation tools drug discovery github
[WEB] small molecule protonation state prediction github

tools.name: TPMS-Designer
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB application for generating and analyzing TPMS-like 3D structures
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Matlab application designed to assist with the generation, analysis, and visualisation of Triply Periodic Minimal Surfaces (TPMS) and other 3D objects, often used in materials science and tissue engineering scaffolds.

tools.name: Jupyter_Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive Jupyter Notebooks for molecular docking workflows
tools.detailed_description: A set of Jupyter Notebooks designed to perform molecular docking protocols interactively. It includes functionality for visualizing molecules, converting file formats, and analyzing docking results, streamlining the structure-based drug design process.

tools.name: MMELON (biomed-multi-view)
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view molecular embedding model combining image, graph, and text
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Multi-view Molecular Embedding with Late Fusion (MMELON) architecture. It combines molecular representations from images, graphs, and text to learn a joint embedding suitable for finetuning on downstream chemical and biological property prediction tasks.

tools.name: 3D-MCTS
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based molecule generation using Monte Carlo Tree Search
tools.detailed_description: A general structure-based molecule generation method that utilizes Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) to explore chemical space and generate 3D molecular structures optimized for specific targets.

tools.name: PCMol
tools.one_line_profile: De novo molecular generator conditioned on protein embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A multi-target de novo molecular generation tool that conditions generation on AlphaFold's latent protein embeddings, enabling the design of ligands tailored to specific protein structures.

tools.name: ConfGF
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular conformation generation via learning gradient fields
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Learning Gradient Fields for Molecular Conformation Generation'. It uses a score-based generative model to estimate the gradient fields of the log-density of atomic coordinates, enabling the generation of stable molecular conformations.

tools.name: rdkit-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of utility scripts for RDKit-based cheminformatics
tools.detailed_description: A repository of Python scripts utilizing RDKit to automate and simplify common cheminformatics tasks, serving as a utility library for molecular data processing and analysis.

tools.name: rdeditor
tools.one_line_profile: Simple GUI molecule editor based on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface (GUI) for editing molecular structures, built using PySide and RDKit. It allows users to interactively modify chemical structures and visualize changes.

tools.name: scikit-mol
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible molecular vectorization using RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides scikit-learn compatible transformer classes for molecular vectorization (fingerprints, descriptors) using RDKit, facilitating the integration of cheminformatics data into standard machine learning pipelines.

tools.name: WGFormer
tools.one_line_profile: SE(3)-Transformer for molecular ground-state conformation prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of WGFormer, a model driven by Wasserstein Gradient Flows for predicting molecular ground-state conformations. It utilizes an SE(3)-equivariant transformer architecture to generate accurate 3D molecular structures.

tools.name: RINGER
tools.one_line_profile: Conformer generation for macrocycles using internal coordinate diffusion
tools.detailed_description: A tool for rapid conformer generation specifically designed for macrocycles. It employs sequence-conditioned internal coordinate diffusion to effectively sample the conformational space of large cyclic molecules.

tools.name: InformaticsMatters Pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Containerised components for cheminformatics workflows
tools.detailed_description: A collection of containerised tools and pipelines for cheminformatics and computational chemistry, designed to facilitate reproducible and scalable data processing and analysis workflows.

tools.name: 3DMolMS
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of tandem mass spectra from 3D molecular conformations
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool for predicting tandem mass spectra directly from 3D molecular conformations, aiding in the identification and elucidation of molecular structures in mass spectrometry experiments.

tools.name: UnityMol
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular visualization and analysis software based on Unity3D
tools.detailed_description: A molecular viewer and analysis tool built on the Unity3D game engine. It provides high-quality visualization of molecular structures, surfaces, and interactions, supporting various file formats and VR capabilities.

tools.name: CGCF-ConfGen
tools.one_line_profile: Neural generative dynamics for molecular conformation generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Learning Neural Generative Dynamics for Molecular Conformation Generation' (CGCF). It uses continuous normalizing flows to model the generative process of molecular conformations, providing a robust baseline for conformation generation tasks.

tools.name: ConfVAE
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end molecular conformation generation via bilevel programming
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of ConfVAE, a framework for molecular conformation generation that integrates a Variational Autoencoder with bilevel programming to optimize conformation stability and diversity.

tools.name: GeoDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric diffusion model for molecular conformation generation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of GeoDiff, a geometric diffusion model designed to generate molecular conformations by learning the distribution of atomic coordinates.

tools.name: psikit
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface bridging Psi4 and RDKit for quantum chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that integrates Psi4 (quantum chemistry) and RDKit (cheminformatics) to facilitate quantum mechanical calculations on molecular structures handled by RDKit.

tools.name: smiles-featurizers
tools.one_line_profile: SMILES embedding extractor using pre-trained language models
tools.detailed_description: A library to extract molecular SMILES embeddings from various pre-trained language models, facilitating downstream molecular machine learning tasks.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for graph neural networks in chemistry and materials
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Keras layers for end-to-end learning on molecules and crystals, integrating with RDKit and Pymatgen for input processing.

tools.name: avgflow
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient molecular conformer generation with flow matching
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SO(3) Averaged Flow-Matching and Reflow for efficient and high-quality molecular conformer generation.

tools.name: nvMolKit
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated computational chemistry toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance library for computational chemistry tasks including molecular similarity calculation, conformer generation, and geometry relaxation, optimized for NVIDIA GPUs.

tools.name: mikko
tools.one_line_profile: Neural processing toolkit for computational neuroscience
tools.detailed_description: A neural processing toolkit designed to handle large-scale computational neuroscience experimental data.

tools.name: FragGen
tools.one_line_profile: Fragment-based 3D molecular generation tool
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for fragment-wise 3D structure-based molecular generation, focusing on producing reliable geometries.

tools.name: SurfGen
tools.one_line_profile: Surface-based 3D molecular generation model
tools.detailed_description: A model for 3D molecular generation that leverages topological surface and geometric structure information.

tools.name: OpenDroneMap
tools.one_line_profile: Photogrammetry toolkit for aerial image processing
tools.detailed_description: A command line toolkit to generate maps, point clouds, 3D models, and DEMs from drone, balloon, or kite imagery, widely used in geospatial science.

tools.name: TautEnum
tools.one_line_profile: Tautomer and ionization state enumerator
tools.detailed_description: A program to generate relevant tautomers and ionization states of molecules at physiological pH, essential for ligand preparation.

tools.name: ccdutils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for PDB Chemical Component Dictionary
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python tools using RDKit to process and analyze small molecules defined in the wwPDB Chemical Component Dictionary.

tools.name: Free-Wilson
tools.one_line_profile: Free-Wilson SAR analysis implementation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Free-Wilson method for Structure-Activity Relationship (SAR) analysis using RDKit.

tools.name: rd_filters
tools.one_line_profile: Structural alert filtering for molecules
tools.detailed_description: A script to screen molecules against structural alerts (e.g., PAINS, Glaxo) using RDKit and ChEMBL data to filter undesirable compounds.

tools.name: solubility
tools.one_line_profile: ESOL aqueous solubility prediction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the ESOL (Estimated SOLubility) method by Delaney for predicting aqueous solubility of molecules using RDKit.

tools.name: useful_rdkit_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of RDKit helper functions
tools.detailed_description: A library of reusable functions and utilities for common cheminformatics tasks using RDKit, developed by Pat Walters.

tools.name: Kaplan
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular conformer searching package
tools.detailed_description: A package dedicated to searching molecular conformational space.

tools.name: pepkalc
tools.one_line_profile: Protein electrostatics simulation for unfolded states
tools.detailed_description: Simulation software for evaluating protein electrostatics specifically in the unfolded state.

tools.name: PACKMAN
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure and dynamics analysis package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for analyzing protein structure and dynamics, providing object-oriented interfaces similar to OpenBabel.

tools.name: RadonPy
tools.one_line_profile: Polymer informatics physical property calculation automation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to automate physical property calculations for polymer informatics, integrating MD simulations and other computational methods.

tools.name: NeuThera-Drug-Discovery-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated generative molecular design toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A modular drug discovery toolkit integrating generative models (TamGen), embeddings (chemBERTa), and profiling tools (DeepPurpose) for molecular design.

tools.name: charmm-conformation
tools.one_line_profile: CHARMM-based conformation search scripts
tools.detailed_description: Scripts to perform conformation searches using replica-exchange molecular dynamics features of the CHARMM software.

tools.name: EBD
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant Blurring Diffusion for conformer generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Equivariant Blurring Diffusion for Hierarchical Molecular Conformer Generation.

tools.name: PREEEDM
tools.one_line_profile: Euclidean Distance Matrix optimization solver
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab package for solving EDM optimization problems, specifically applied to sensor network localization and molecular conformation determination.

tools.name: SQREDM
tools.one_line_profile: Solver for EDM optimization problems
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab package for solving Euclidean Distance Matrix optimization problems, applicable to molecular conformation tasks.

tools.name: SlicerRT
tools.one_line_profile: Radiation therapy research toolkit for 3D Slicer
tools.detailed_description: An open-source toolkit for radiation therapy research, extending 3D Slicer with features for DICOM-RT, dose analysis, and treatment planning.

tools.name: ML4SMILES
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular property prediction using substructure embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automatic prediction of molecular properties using substructure vector embeddings within a feature selection workflow.

tools.name: cheminformatics-microservice
tools.one_line_profile: Microservices for cheminformatics tasks
tools.detailed_description: A set of microservices providing API access to essential cheminformatics functionalities.

tools.name: mol_property
tools.one_line_profile: pKa prediction from chemical structure
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting pKa values from chemical structures using machine learning approaches and molecular similarity.

tools.name: Ringo
tools.one_line_profile: Kinematics-driven conformer generation library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for generating molecular conformers using kinematics-driven approaches.

tools.name: Molecular3DLengthDescriptors
tools.one_line_profile: 3D conformational molecular descriptors
tools.detailed_description: A set of 3D conformational based molecular descriptors designed for use in QSPR and Machine Learning models.

tools.name: ScaffoldGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffold network and tree analysis library
tools.detailed_description: An open-source cheminformatics library for generating and analyzing scaffold networks and scaffold trees, built on RDKit and NetworkX.

tools.name: dimorphite_dl
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular ionization and tautomerization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating appropriate protonation states and tautomers for molecules at a given pH, useful for docking preparation.

tools.name: smi2sdf3d
tools.one_line_profile: 3D diverse conformer generator
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool to generate diverse 3D conformers from SMILES strings using RDKit.

tools.name: VFLP
tools.one_line_profile: VirtualFlow for Ligand Preparation
tools.detailed_description: A workflow module within the VirtualFlow suite specifically designed for the preparation of ligand libraries for virtual screening.

tools.name: GeminiMol
tools.one_line_profile: Conformational space-aware molecular representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool incorporating conformational space profiles into molecular representation learning for applications in drug discovery like virtual screening and target identification.

tools.name: seq2seq-fingerprint
tools.one_line_profile: Seq2seq unsupervised molecular embedding
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Seq2seq Fingerprint model for generating unsupervised deep molecular embeddings for drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: MolGpKa
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-CNN for pKa prediction
tools.detailed_description: A graph-convolutional neural network model designed to predict the pKa values of chemical compounds.

tools.name: conformer-rl
tools.one_line_profile: Deep reinforcement learning for conformer generation
tools.detailed_description: A library utilizing deep reinforcement learning techniques to generate molecular conformers.

tools.name: moldrug
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic algorithm for drug-oriented molecular optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for drug-oriented optimization in chemical space, often used for generating new molecules with desired properties.

tools.name: rdkit_ipynb_tools
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit-based helper tools for chemical data handling in Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python tools and utilities to facilitate the use of RDKit within IPython/Jupyter notebooks, focusing on visualization and data processing.

tools.name: cheapocrest
tools.one_line_profile: Cost-effective conformer generation utility wrapping CREST
tools.detailed_description: A tool from the Aspuru-Guzik group for generating molecular conformers efficiently, likely by wrapping or simplifying the CREST workflow.

tools.name: PLACER
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network for protein-ligand conformational ensemble prediction
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning method for predicting the local conformational ensembles of protein-ligand binding sites.

tools.name: MolPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible wrapper for RDKit molecular processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that integrates RDKit molecular processing capabilities into scikit-learn pipelines for chemoinformatics machine learning tasks.

tools.name: pKAI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning approach for pKa prediction
tools.detailed_description: A fast and interpretable deep learning model for accurate electrostatics-driven pKa prediction of molecules.

tools.name: mols2grid
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive 2D molecular viewer for dataframes
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that generates interactive grids of 2D molecular structures from pandas DataFrames, useful for screening and visualization.

tools.name: chembience
tools.one_line_profile: Docker-based platform for chemoinformatics applications
tools.detailed_description: A platform facilitating the development and deployment of chemoinformatics web applications and microservices using Docker.

tools.name: chembl_beaker
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit wrapper and web service from ChEMBL
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper around RDKit providing chemical utility functions, often used as a backend service for ChEMBL related tools.

tools.name: ProLIF
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Fingerprints generator
tools.detailed_description: A library to generate and analyze interaction fingerprints for protein-ligand complexes from molecular dynamics trajectories or docking poses.

tools.name: rdchiral
tools.one_line_profile: Stereochemistry-aware wrapper for RDKit reaction handling
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper for RDKit's reaction handling functionality that improves the handling of stereochemistry during template-based reaction extraction and application.

tools.name: ePMV
tools.one_line_profile: Embedded Python Molecular Viewer for 3D animation software
tools.detailed_description: A tool that runs molecular modeling software directly inside professional 3D animation applications like Blender, Maya, and Cinema 4D.

tools.name: PyRMD
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered Virtual Screening tool
tools.detailed_description: A software package for performing virtual screening campaigns using artificial intelligence methods.

tools.name: datamol
tools.one_line_profile: High-level molecular processing library built on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a simplified and ergonomic API for molecular processing and manipulation, built on top of RDKit.

tools.name: Uni-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: 3D molecular representation learning framework
tools.detailed_description: A universal 3D molecular representation learning framework that can be used for various tasks including conformation generation and property prediction.

tools.name: rdkit-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of RDKit-based cheminformatics scripts
tools.detailed_description: A set of command-line scripts and utilities for common cheminformatics tasks using RDKit, developed by the Koes Lab.

tools.name: Uni-pKa
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for pKa prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for predicting the pKa values of small molecules, developed by DP Technology.

tools.name: dimorphite_dl
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular protonation state generator
tools.detailed_description: A tool that adds or removes hydrogen atoms to molecules to generate appropriate protonation states for a user-specified pH range.

tools.name: gypsum_dl
tools.one_line_profile: 3D small molecule conformer generator
tools.detailed_description: An open-source program for preparing 3D small-molecule structures from 2D representations, handling ionization, tautomers, and ring conformations.

tools.name: chemistry_drawer
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular visualization using Plotly
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to draw chemical structures using the Plotly graphing library, enabling interactive visualizations.

tools.name: Meeko
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for AutoDock molecule preparation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for preparing molecules for AutoDock docking, including reading/writing PDBQT files and handling flexible residues.

tools.name: torsional-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion model for molecular conformer generation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Torsional Diffusion, a deep learning method for generating diverse and low-energy molecular conformers.

tools.name: ChemmineOB
tools.one_line_profile: R interface to OpenBabel
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to the OpenBabel C++ library for cheminformatics applications within the R ecosystem.

tools.name: ConfOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Energy-inspired molecular conformation optimization model
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of the ICLR 2022 paper 'Energy-Inspired Molecular Conformation Optimization'. It provides a deep learning based approach to optimize molecular conformations by minimizing energy, serving as a solver for 3D structure generation.

tools.name: MolGraphEval
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for self-supervised molecular graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking and evaluation tool for self-supervised learning methods on molecular graph embeddings. It allows researchers to assess the quality of learned representations for downstream molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: espsim
tools.one_line_profile: Shape and electrostatic potential similarity scoring tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for calculating shape and Electrostatic Potential (ESP) similarity between molecules using RDKit. It is widely used in ligand-based virtual screening to find molecules with similar 3D electronic properties.

tools.name: clusttraj
tools.one_line_profile: Clustering tool for molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python script that performs agglomerative clustering on molecular dynamics (MD) or Monte Carlo trajectories to classify and extract representative structures from simulation data.

tools.name: POAP
tools.one_line_profile: Parallelized pipeline for Open Babel and Autodock
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline tool that automates and parallelizes ligand preparation and docking workflows using Open Babel and the Autodock suite, facilitating high-throughput virtual screening.

tools.name: pKa-ANI
tools.one_line_profile: Protein pKa prediction using ANI potentials
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accurate prediction of protein pKa values utilizing representation learning and ANI (ANAKIN-ME) neural network potentials, enabling physics-informed property prediction.

tools.name: Gypsum-DL
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality 3D conformer generation and preparation
tools.detailed_description: A program for converting 2D SMILES strings into high-quality 3D molecular models. It handles ionization, tautomeric states, and ring conformations to prepare ligand libraries for virtual screening.

tools.name: get_conformations
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular conformation generation scripts
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts from the Jensen Group for generating molecular conformations, likely using RDKit and other force field methods, intended for use in computational chemistry workflows.

tools.name: xyz2mol
tools.one_line_profile: XYZ coordinates to RDKit molecule converter
tools.detailed_description: A utility that converts Cartesian coordinates (XYZ format) into RDKit molecular objects by inferring connectivity and bond orders, solving a common problem in interpreting raw quantum chemistry output.

tools.name: AQME
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Quantum Mechanical Environments workflows
tools.detailed_description: Automated Quantum Mechanical Environments (AQME) provides reproducible workflows for conformer generation (RDKit/CREST), QM input creation, and post-processing, bridging cheminformatics and quantum mechanics.

tools.name: DeePhase
tools.one_line_profile: Predictor of protein liquid-liquid phase separation
tools.detailed_description: A prediction tool for homotypic liquid-liquid phase separation (LLPS) of proteins based on sequence determinants and embeddings, as described in the associated PNAS paper.

tools.name: KIF
tools.one_line_profile: Key Interactions Finder for molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to identify key molecular interactions that regulate conformational changes in proteins or complexes, aiding in the analysis of molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: Scopy
tools.one_line_profile: Negative design library for HTS/VS database design
tools.detailed_description: An integrated Python library for negative design in high-throughput screening (HTS) and virtual screening (VS). It provides filters to remove undesirable compounds (e.g., PAINS, frequent hitters) from chemical libraries.

tools.name: GEOM
tools.one_line_profile: Energy-annotated molecular conformation dataset and API
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset of energy-annotated molecular conformations for machine learning in chemistry. The repository provides access to the data and utilities for processing these conformations.

tools.name: scikit-chem
tools.one_line_profile: High-level cheminformatics package built on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A cheminformatics library for the Scientific Python stack that provides a more pythonic and high-level interface to RDKit and Open Babel functionalities for molecular manipulation and analysis.

tools.name: PIDGINv3
tools.one_line_profile: Protein target prediction using random forests
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein targets for small molecules using random forest models and reliability-density neighbourhood analysis, aiding in target identification and off-target prediction.

tools.name: eMolFrag
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular fragmentation tool based on BRICS
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for fragmenting molecules into building blocks using the BRICS algorithm. It is useful for fragment-based drug design and library generation.

tools.name: dockey
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated tool for molecular docking and virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: An integrated software tool designed to streamline molecular docking and virtual screening workflows, likely providing a unified interface for preparing ligands/receptors and running docking simulations.

tools.name: PoseBusters
tools.one_line_profile: Plausibility checks for generated molecule poses using geometric and chemical constraints
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to perform sanity checks on generated molecule poses, ensuring they are chemically and physically plausible. It evaluates bond lengths, angles, clashes, and other stereochemical properties to filter out unrealistic docking or generative model outputs.

tools.name: Molecular Rectifier
tools.one_line_profile: Automated correction tool for unsanitizable RDKit molecules
tools.detailed_description: A utility designed to fix common valence and connectivity errors in molecular structures that fail RDKit sanitization. It iteratively attempts to correct the molecule structure to make it chemically valid and processable.

tools.name: RDKit to Params
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to generate Rosetta params files from RDKit molecules for protein modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that facilitates the conversion of RDKit molecule objects into Rosetta parameter files (topology files). This enables the use of small molecules prepared in RDKit within the Rosetta software suite for docking and design tasks.

tools.name: pkasolver
tools.one_line_profile: Graph convolutional network toolkit for predicting pKa values of small molecules
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning toolkit that uses Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs) to predict the pKa values of small molecules. It provides a workflow for training models and predicting acid dissociation constants, crucial for understanding molecular behavior in biological systems.

tools.name: MolVS
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule validation and standardization library based on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library built on top of RDKit for validating, standardizing, and salt stripping of chemical structures. It ensures consistency in chemical datasets by handling tautomers, normalization, and fragment removal.

tools.name: OpenBabel Node
tools.one_line_profile: Node.js bindings for the Open Babel chemical toolbox
tools.detailed_description: Provides Node.js bindings for the Open Babel C++ library, enabling developers to perform chemical file conversion and data processing within JavaScript/Node.js environments.

tools.name: Molecular Transformer Embeddings
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based model to generate molecular embeddings from text representations
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool that utilizes Transformer architectures to translate molecular text representations (like SMILES/InChI) into continuous vector embeddings, facilitating downstream machine learning tasks in drug discovery.

tools.name: Diffusion Conformer
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion-based generative model for small molecule conformer generation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a diffusion probabilistic model specifically designed for generating diverse and energetically favorable 3D conformers of small molecules from 2D graphs.

tools.name: ODDT
tools.one_line_profile: Open Drug Discovery Toolkit for virtual screening, interaction scoring, and machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A modular and comprehensive toolkit for computer-aided drug discovery (CADD). It provides unified interfaces for various docking software, scoring functions (including RF-Score and NN-Score), and interaction fingerprint generation.

tools.name: Open Babel
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical toolbox for converting between chemical file formats and analyzing molecular data
tools.detailed_description: A standard chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of chemical data. It allows searching, converting, analyzing, and storing data from molecular modeling, chemistry, solid-state materials, biochemistry, or related areas.

tools.name: TorsionNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep neural network for predicting small molecule torsion energy profiles
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model developed to predict the torsion energy profiles of small molecules with accuracy comparable to Quantum Mechanics (QM) methods, facilitating faster conformational analysis.

tools.name: PLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Profiler for analyzing non-covalent interactions in PDB files
tools.detailed_description: A tool for fully automated detection and visualization of relevant non-covalent protein-ligand interactions in 3D structures. It handles hydrogen bonds, hydrophobic contacts, pi-stacking, and more.

tools.name: optking
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular geometry optimization program typically used with quantum chemistry packages
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based molecular geometry optimization library. It is designed to work with quantum chemistry software (like Psi4) to find equilibrium structures and transition states of molecules.

tools.name: P2Rank
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning-based tool for ligand binding site prediction from protein structures
tools.detailed_description: A standalone command-line tool that predicts ligand-binding pockets from protein structures using a machine learning approach based on local structural features. It is known for its speed and accuracy in identifying druggable sites.

tools.name: RDKit
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of cheminformatics and machine learning software for molecular data processing
tools.detailed_description: The industry-standard open-source cheminformatics software toolkit. It provides extensive functionality for molecule manipulation, descriptor calculation, fingerprint generation, substructure searching, and molecular visualization.

tools.name: RDKit.js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript port of the RDKit cheminformatics library
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive cheminformatics and molecule rendering toolkit for JavaScript environments, enabling client-side molecular manipulation, substructure search, and visualization within web applications.

tools.name: RDKit_mETKDG
tools.one_line_profile: Modified ETKDG workflow for conformer generation
tools.detailed_description: A specialized implementation of the ETKDG (Experimental-Torsion Knowledge Distance Geometry) algorithm with modifications for improved conformer generation, provided as a Dockerized workflow.

tools.name: chemicalite
tools.one_line_profile: SQLite extension for cheminformatics
tools.detailed_description: A chemical database extension for SQLite that adds support for molecular data types, substructure search, and chemical descriptors directly within the database engine.

tools.name: ConfID
tools.one_line_profile: Conformational characterization method for small molecules
tools.detailed_description: An analytical tool for characterizing the conformational space of small molecules using molecular dynamics trajectories, aiding in the identification of relevant conformers.

tools.name: P3DFFT++
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel 3D Fast Fourier Transform library
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance, scalable library for computing parallel 3D Fast Fourier Transforms, essential for simulating multiscale phenomena in molecular dynamics and materials science.

tools.name: ETFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant Flow Matching for molecular conformer generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model implementing equivariant flow matching to generate valid and diverse 3D molecular conformers.

tools.name: pgchem
tools.one_line_profile: PostgreSQL extension for chemical data
tools.detailed_description: A PostgreSQL extension integrating OpenBabel functionality, allowing for storage, indexing, and querying of chemical structures and substructures directly within the database.

tools.name: AVATREE
tools.one_line_profile: Modelling framework for airway tree conformations
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for generating anatomically valid airway tree conformations from CT data and simulating broncho-constriction, useful for pulmonary studies.

tools.name: UnifiedMolPretrain
tools.one_line_profile: Unified 2D and 3D pre-training for molecular representations
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for pre-training molecular representations by integrating both 2D graph and 3D geometric information to improve downstream task performance.

tools.name: pharmacophore-toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for generating pharmacophore models from RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools to generate, visualize, and manipulate simple pharmacophore models derived from molecular structures using RDKit.

tools.name: protocolGromacs
tools.one_line_profile: Automated GROMACS simulation protocol
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based workflow automation tool for GROMACS, handling steps from ligand parametrization to production dynamics.

tools.name: moltiverse
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced sampling for molecular conformer generation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating molecular conformers using enhanced sampling methods, designed to explore conformational space more effectively.

tools.name: molplotly
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecule visualization for Plotly
tools.detailed_description: An extension to Plotly that enables interactive visualization of molecular structures on mouseover events within scatter plots, facilitating chemical data analysis.

tools.name: MF-SuP-pKa
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-fidelity pKa prediction model
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a multi-fidelity modeling approach with subgraph pooling mechanism for accurate pKa prediction of small molecules.

tools.name: RDMC
tools.one_line_profile: Reaction Data and Molecular Conformers package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for handling chemical reactions, molecules, and their conformers, with a focus on 3D structural manipulation and analysis.

tools.name: GMVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian Mixture VAE for molecular simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool for learning interpretable embeddings from molecular simulation data using Gaussian Mixture Variational Autoencoders, aiding in the analysis of conformational dynamics.
